name: honest (feat. moon tang)
lyrics:
作词 : Gareth.T/Jacob Strom
作曲 : Gareth.T/Jacob Strom
编曲 : Gareth.T/Patrick Yip/Teddy Fan
制作人 : Gareth.T/Teddy Fan/Patrick Yip
Honest
老实说
Don't know why I keep trying
不知自己为何还在坚持
When everybody famous
当每个名人
Says fame is not the greatest
都说名乃身外之物
Honest
“诚实”
It's too hard to be honest
心口如一太难了
When everybody's faking
当每个人都在演
And all they feel is vacant
心中只剩麻木和空虚
But what would I be
但我又会如何
If I said imma stop?
假如当初我扬言放弃
How can I dream
梦难道还会继续吗
When I gotta wake up
在我醒来之际
In the city of millions millions
在这人山人海的城市里
Don't be sad
不要黯然神伤
If I'm just not the one
即使感觉被命运抛弃
In the city of millions millions
在这车水马龙的城市里
I'll just keep pushing my luck
我将一直奋进
Untill I give up
直至终了
Untill I give up
直至终了
Untill I give up
直至终了
Untill I give up
直至终了
I'm over-thinking too much
我顾虑的太多
Thinking that I can't do enough
认为自己做的还不够
Wrote too many songs about love
曾写过太多情歌
So I never really learned to grow up
从来没有学着长大
I don't wanna be young rich and famous
我不求年少有为
If I can't still be myself
如果代价是不能做自己
So until my music gets all famous
所以在我的音乐流行之前
I'll spend more time on myself
我会花更多时间专注于自己
So what will I be (What will I be)
将会是一个怎样的我？
If I said imma stop?
假如我说要放弃
How can I dream
梦难道还会继续吗
When I gotta wake up
在我醒来之际
In the city of millions millions
在这人山人海的城市里
Don't be sad
不要黯然神伤
If I'm just not the one
即使感觉被命运抛弃
In the city of millions millions
在这车水马龙的城市里
I'll just keep pushing my luck
我将一直奋进
Untill I give up
直至终了
Untill I give up
直至终了
Untill I give up
直至终了
Untill I give up
直至终了
Untill I give up
直至终了
收起
